info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 9:17AM EDT until April 7 at 11:40PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
Flatrock River at Saint Paul.
Sugar Creek at New Palestine.
Mill Creek near Cataract.
Sugar Creek near Edinburgh.
Fall Creek at Millersville.
.Heavy rainfall across central Indiana from several events over the past week has brought minor to significant flooding to several rivers, creeks and streams in central Indiana. Most of these smaller watersheds should all be back below flood stage by Tuesday morning, but Sugar Creek at Edinburgh may stay above flood stage until Tuesday night. Major flooding in several locations along the mainstem rivers will continue through the week.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Fall Creek at Millersville.
* WHEN...Until late this evening.
* IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Extensive flooding along Fall Creek. Local roads are flooded. Building northeast of gaging site can be flooded by a few feet of water if flood protection fails.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM EDT Monday was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1145 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING
